tags.name: Activity
tags.description: An activity is an object that may be presented on a calendar and may be moved through a workflow.

tags.name: Activitydefinition
tags.description: An activity definition is a template for creating calendar based recurrence items (activities)

tags.name: Contact
tags.description: A contact represents a person or entity that and a means to communicate with them

tags.name: Device
tags.description: A device represents a physical device used to access gravity. Gravity uses these to send notifications.

tags.name: File
tags.description: A file is an abstract representation of data that is stored in a file on a computer

tags.name: Group
tags.description: A group is a collection of roles

tags.name: Heartbeat
tags.description: Heartbeat is a capability that allows any client to identify a gravity instance.

tags.name: Login
tags.description: Login logs a credentialed user into gravity.

tags.name: Note
tags.description: A note is an item associated to a person or resource that provides additional information

tags.name: Notificationstatus
tags.description: Notificatio status allows a gravity client to get the current state of notifications for a user.

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: An organization is an object that represents a collection of people.

tags.name: Policy
tags.description: A policy is the most basic entity with which to describe an access permission

tags.name: Preference
tags.description: A preference is a like or dislike for a user.

tags.name: Role
tags.description: A role is a collection of policies/

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Perfoms a search across several different microservices.

tags.name: Setting
tags.description: A setting is a value that tells gravity hwo to operate on a per user basis within a specific area.

tags.name: Signup
tags.description: Signup is the intial route to register a new client to gravity

tags.name: Sop
tags.description: An SOP (Standard Operating Procedure) is a template for an Activity.

tags.name: Tag
tags.description: A tag is a general purpose item to allow for cross resource correlation.

tags.name: User
tags.description: A user is a person with credentials into gravity. A user has groups that describes their permissions.
